column4: Is there anyway to.. i dont know... Replicate compiz without using it?

google is my best source

I was not being sarcastic.. sorry some people say to google stuff to be rude
look in nautalis , rightclick on an exe and it will allow you to change what application opens it
it is underr the EXE files prefrences
